item.title: Are you mocking me?
item.description: Unit testing is one of the most important parts of any project. TDD (test driven development) is a good habit to cultivate, in case you are not convinced, you don't know about TDD or you have never given it a try. I started using partial TDD recently, yes only partial for what I follow is that first I write a rough outline of the code, then I write tests and then I keep on re-factoring my code till all the tests are passing.
